column4: after installing wine an error has occur in my pc tht is not allowing me to install or remove any package so....any soln
You are required to cite the error message completely.

this is error msg(((There seems to be a programming error in aptdaemon, the software that allows you to install/remove software and to perform other package management related tasks. Please report this error at http://launchpad.net/aptdaemon/+filebug and retry.)))
So to me it is clear what you should do next: i.) Please report the error in Launchpad. ii.) Try to install wine anew.
